original_text: And the woman arose, and did after the saying of the man of God: and she went with her household, and sojourned in the land of the Philistines seven years.
korean_text: 여인이 일어나서 하나님의 사람의 말대로 행하여 그의 가족과 함께 가서 블레셋 사람들의 땅에 칠 년을 우거하다가

sentences.original_text: and did after the saying of the man of God
and she went with her household
and sojourned in the land of the Philistines
